original_text: But once there were seven brothers. The oldest brother married a woman. But he died before they had any children.
korean_text: 칠 형제가 있었는데 맏이가 아내를 취하였다가 상속자가 없이 죽고

sentences.original_text: But once there were seven brothers.
The oldest brother married a woman.
sentences.korean_translation: 가장 큰 형이 한 여자와 결혼했습니다.

sentences.original_text: But he died before they had any children.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들이 아이를 갖기 전에 그가 죽었습니다.
